description: Please share some of your thoughts and preferences regarding the software development industry.

questions.question: What is your favorite software `Integrated Development Environment (IDE)`?
What is the funniest programming interview question that you were asked?

description: Pick which famous TV character that you are most alike!

questions.question: Which `Golden Girl` are you from The Golden Girls TV series?
Which `Friend` are you from the american sitcom called Friends?
